name: Slapdash
description:
Slapdash is a game created for the Bullet Hell Jam. Slapdash randomly generates quick and short boss fights. Share boss codes with your friends and have fun!

CONTROLS: 

Movement - WASD/ARROW KEYS

Dash - Left Shift

Reset/Play - R

Pause/Unpause - ESC

*****IMPORTANT*****
Unfortunately, the copy button doesn't appear to be working on the WebGL version of the game. If you want access to this to share codes you will have to download the Windows or macOS builds or just type in the code manually. Sorry!

P.S. The WebGL version of the game uses a development build as normal builds were not working. So that's why sometimes certain things pop in the console shouldn't affect gameplay though.
